name: Not Battle City
description:
================
### Features ###
================

One day I've thought - "What if I take the Battle City and increase the speed of the shells to the maximum?". As of the result: The classic NES "Battle City" game with steroids. Realistic controls of the tank. Shooting in any direction. Tricky enemies. 15 maps and a level editor. Perhaps, the difficulty is too high. Hidden bonuses will make the game more diverse.

==================
### Bonus list ###
==================

Helmet: An immortality for 30 seconds. It resets immediately after being hit.

Clock: Freezing all enemy tanks for 15 seconds.

Star: Increases the level of your tank (also repairs it).

Pistol: Like 3 bonus Stars.

Grenade: Kill all enemy on the map.

Tank: Extra life.

// not original bonuses:

Scaner: Shows the positions of all enemy tanks on the map for a few seconds.

Recochet: The tank gets the reflection ability of incoming shells.

Worning: If an enemy is going to attack you, you'll know about that right away.

===========================
### Hot to change stage ###
===========================

You can choose any available level at the beginning of a new game.
To do so, press the left or right arrows on the gray screen.

=====================
### Damage system ###
=====================

The part of the tank you hit is important on the battlefield.
Each tank has armor equal to its level.
The damage of the shell is also equal to the level of the tank.
Also the tank can have the "damaged" state.

There are two conditions in which a tank can be destroyed:
1) The level of the shell is higher than the level of the tank.
2) The tank is in "damaged" condition.

If the level of the shell is below or equal to the level of the tank, the tank will receive the status "damaged".

================
### Ricochet ###
================

The ricochet allows you to not take damage from a shell.
However, you have to be at the right angle from the flying shell to do this.

=============================
### NES-like tank control ###
=============================

In order to make the control of the tank like in the original game, enter the word `CASUAL` on the gray screen.

================================
### Better realistic control ###
================================

If you want the tank to be driven like a pro car: change 'RotationAsIfYouInTheCar' value to 'true' in the 'input.xml' file.
